description:
Miguel Reguero/Rodrigo Núñez - Cybersecurity in the financial sector with Python
[EuroPython 2016]
[21 July 2016]
[Bilbao, Euskadi, Spain]
(https://ep2016.europython.eu//conference/talks/ciberseguridad-en-el-sector-financiero-con-python)

When people talk about cybersecurity they often think about ethical
hacking and exploits, that is but a fraction of what cybersecurity is
about, today we are going to talk about another aspect, which is often
deemed as not too important.
title: Cybersecurity in the financial sector with Python
